update e_user set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electric = #{electric,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orders = #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, qr_img = #{qrImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invide_user = #{invideUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pubdic_idcard_type = #{pubdicIdcardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profile_image = #{profileImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wallet_id = #{walletId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE e_wallet SET amount=amount+500 WHERE user_id=#{invideUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.select:
SELECT nick_name AS nickName , name, sex, phone AS mobile, id_card , age, electric, orders, qr_img AS qrImg, profile_image AS headImgUrl, IFNULL(wallet.amount, 0) AS amount,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM e_share s WHERE u.id = s.user_id AND is_delete=0 AND device_id !="" ) AS shareDeviceNum,
( SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM e_chat WHERE is_read=0 AND to_user=u.id ) AS hasUnReadChat,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM e_share s WHERE u.id = s.user_id AND is_delete=0 AND device_id ="" ) AS sharePictureNum,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM e_device d WHERE d.user_id=u.id ) AS deviceCount,
(SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM e_share_act sa, e_share s WHERE sa.share_id=s.id AND s.is_delete=0 AND sa.is_read=0 AND s.user_id=u.id) AS hasUnReadAct
FROM e_user u LEFT JOIN e_wallet wallet ON u.id = wallet.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT (@rownum:=@rownum+1) AS rownum, u.profile_image AS headImgUrl, address, nick_name,pubdic_sex sex , orders
FROM e_user u ,(SELECT @rownum:= 0 ) r
ORDER BY orders DESC LIMIT 30

SELECT a.nick_name,a.rownum,a.orders, a.profile_image AS headImgUrl FROM ( SELECT (@rownum:=@rownum+1) AS rownum, u.* FROM e_user u, (SELECT @rownum:= 0 ) r ORDER BY u.`orders` DESC ) AS a WHERE a.id= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE e_user SET electric=electric+50, orders=orders+1 WHERE id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
